attributes.action: Offer the Rates Relief Package to all Commercial Ratepayers from 1st April 2020
attributes.additional_details:
To help businesses retain people in employment through a very difficult economic period which is unprecedented. An example of this would be that associated businesses who work in offices, warehouses or workshops but are still linked to the hospitality or leisure industry are not receiving any Rates Relief.

https://scottishfinancialnews.com/article/scottish-government-announces-2-2bn-fund-for-business-affected-by-coronavirus
attributes.background: Grant 100% relief of Commercial Rates to assist all businesses in Scotland amid the Covid-19 outbreak. This should not be limited to hospitality, leisure and retail only.

rejection.details:
These measures are a matter for the Scottish Government, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find information about current support measures, including those added since you started this petition, here: https://www.gov.scot/news/additional-support-for-business/

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

https://www.gov.scot/coronavirus-covid-19/

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
